definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: Nor wars did men molest, When only beechen bowls were in request.
sentences.chinese: 在所需只是山毛榉的碗碟时。

sentences.english: They were sitting on the lawn under a large beech tree.
sentences.chinese: 他们在一棵高大的山毛榉树下的草坪上坐着。

sentences.english: Any of several other woody plants, as in the genera Carpinus and Nothofagus.
sentences.chinese: 一种其他木本植物，如鹅耳枥属和假山毛榉属。

sentences.english: In some melodious plot of beechen green, and shadows numberless.
sentences.chinese: 在山毛榉绿影下的情结中。
硬木地板橡木，山毛榉，白蜡木。

sentences.english: Of beechen green, and shadows numberless, singest of summer in full-throated ease.
sentences.chinese: 你躲进山毛榉的葱绿和荫影，放开歌喉，歌唱着夏季。

sentences.english: The worktop is made of solid beech.
sentences.chinese: 操作台是由结实的山毛榉木做成的。

sentences.english: Of beechen green, and shadows numberless.
sentences.chinese: 你躲进山毛榉的葱绿和荫影。

sentences.english: Beech turns easily in the lathe.
sentences.chinese: 山毛榉在车床上很容易车制。

sentences.english: The larvae live on the leaves of beech , oak, and several other trees.
sentences.chinese: 幼虫生活在山毛榉的叶子，栎，和其他一些树木。

sentences.english: I like a selection of beech for fast-burning and oak for smouldering.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢用山毛榉木快速燃烧，用橡木阴燃。

definition: Chinese ash (Fraxinus chinensis), whose bark, flowers and leaves are used in TCM
Masson pine (Pinus massoniana, Chinese red pine, horsetail pine)
